title: Login to Heaven
description: Writer Neil Ionov forges a path into the world of new and original science fiction with his book, Login to Heaven – a gateway to new ideas and fascinating possibilities!The author’s original storyline merges high technology and high spirituality into one integrated world. IT departments operate in monasteries where hundreds of programmers invent new technologies, disseminating them via “cloud servers,” and designers create innovative equipment and gadgets. Scientists in monastery laboratories, working in concert with the Heavenly World, engineer celestial armor and make incredible scientific breakthroughs.You too can acquire your own “Login to Heaven” and access to a world of new ideas and possibilities!
author: Neil Ionov
